config.siddhiApp: @App:name('ChartProvider')@App:description('Defines the data store and the table for the quering')@store(type = 'rdbms', datasource = 'WORLD') define table country(code string, name string,continent string,region string,surfaceArea double,indepYear  int,population int,lifeExpectancy double,gnp double,gnpOld double,localName string,governmentForm string,headOfState string,capital double,code2 string);
